pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, May 3, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will participate in a virtual discussion with seniors from Résidence Memphrémagog in Magog, Quebec. Member of Parliament for Brome—Missisquoi Lyne Bessette will be in attendance.

The discussion will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, will participate in a virtual discussion with residents from Shannex’s Losier Hall in Miramichi, New Brunswick. Minister of Seniors Deb Schulte and Member of Parliament for Miramichi—Grand Lake Pat Finnigan will be in attendance.

The opening remarks will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
